alert.note: Alert for Forest; Langlade; Lincoln; Oneida (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 29 at 11:34PM CDT by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Forest, northeastern Lincoln, southeastern Oneida and northwestern Langlade Counties through 1230 AM CDT... At 1133 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Rhinelander, moving east-southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Ma Ka Ja Wan Scout Reservation around 1230 AM CDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Summit Lake, Kelly Lynn Bog Natural Area, Post Lake, Kempster, Otter Springs Recreation Area, Starks, Crescent Corner, Lawrence Lake Natural Area, Pelican Lake and Nashville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
